title: Pixel XL boot loop
content:
Like a week ago my phone started to freeze when using the camera. To get it working again, I had to force restart it, pressing down the power button for several seconds.

Today I was using the camera and my phone froze again, this time it restarted by itself and is now in an endless boot loop.

I already tried factory reset and installing the latest OTA for my device (9.0.0 (PQ3A.190801.002, Aug 2019)) from this link (https://developers.google.com/android/ota) using the ADB in my laptop, but neither of these worked.

I would like to know which other options I have to get it working again, or if there is something Google can do for me.

I bought it from Amazon as a certified refurbished device a year and four months ago.

Thanks for your help.
